name: browser
description: Playwright-powered browser automation for web scraping, testing, and interaction

chromium.description: Fast, modern browser with good debugging tools

notes: Run in headless mode in production environments
Be cautious when visiting untrusted websites
Disable JavaScript execution for simple scraping tasks
Use incognito/private mode to avoid cookie tracking
Set proper user agent to identify your bot
Respect robots.txt and site terms of service
recommendations: Limit concurrent browser instances to prevent resource exhaustion
Set timeouts to prevent hanging operations
Clear browser data between sessions for privacy
Use proxy servers for IP rotation if needed

examples.usage: Navigate to pages and extract structured data
Visual debugging with visible browser and slow motion
Capture high-quality screenshots of web pages

installation.note: Playwright browsers must be installed separately
